message.raw:
Fix log playback with levels

* This removes creation of entities from the LogPlayback system. Entities will be created as the ECM is populated from serialized state.
* This also sets `ComponentState::PeriodicChange` on entities that have updated poses.
* The LevelManager is updated to only process the default level if `useLevels` is turned off. This fixes the unintended interaction between the level manager and log playback

Note that when running log playback, the simulation has to be started before anything shows up on the screen.

Note that when running log playback, the simulation has to be started before anything shows up on the screen.

message:
Fix log playback with levels

* This removes creation of entities from the LogPlayback system. Entities will be created as the ECM is populated from serialized state.
* This also sets `ComponentState::PeriodicChange` on entities that have updated poses.
* The LevelManager is updated to only process the default level if `useLevels` is turned off. This fixes the unintended interaction between the level manager and log playback

Note that when running log playback, the simulation has to be started before anything shows up on the screen.
